I made a Game Maker extension that stores all lines from a text file to an array then outputs 1 random array line (useful for game hints, quotes, random name gen, etc).

Try it if you've haven't done much file reading, the code is minimal and commented:

Silly that the Rosetta Stone is this civic tribute to Ptolemy V done w/ business & legit hieroglyphics & greek; if Napoleonic armies had shifted few lat/long or like a natural disaster swallowed it up Ancient Egyptian literacy might have been even more fuzzy than it currently is.

Interesting that the Netherlands are considered absent from romanticism movement.  

Is it bc of societal safety acquired through mercantile wealth?  

i.e. they didn't need it bc of affluence/lack of austerity and/or religious friction that other western civilizations endured?
Genuinely curious and I'm unsure where to find additional historical context.
